variables.name: PaymentToken
variables.description: The payment token received from Zift.

variables.name: PaymentNumber
variables.description: The card or bank account number entered by the contact.

variables.name: PaymentMethod
variables.description: The payment method chosen by the contact. Either "Card" or "Bank"

variables.name: TransactionId
variables.description: The ID of the transaction in C3.

variables.name: PaymentAccessory
variables.description: The expiration date for a card or the routing number for a bank account, as entered by the contact.

variables.name: ZiftUsername
variables.description: The username for the Zift account used by C3.

variables.name: ZiftPassword
variables.description: The password for the Zift account used by C3.

variables.name: ZiftAccountId
variables.description: The username for the Zift account used by C3.

variables.name: PaymentError
variables.description: The payment error received from Zift.

variables.name: ZiftSubdomain
variables.description: The subdomain to use for Zift payments.

variables.name: C3Env
variables.description: The C3 environment to use in flow (dev, staging, or prod).

variables.name: C3BaseUrl
variables.description: The base URL to use for C3, based on the environment.

variables.name: C3ApiKey
variables.description: The API key assigned to your C3 vendor.

properties.description: Asks the customer how they would like to pay: bank account or credit card.

promptsTts.value:
To pay with a credit or debit card, press 1.
To pay directly with your bank account, press 2.
promptsTts.name:
To pay with a credit or debit card, press 1.
To pay directly with your bank account, press 2.

properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: AskForPaymentMethod

properties.description: Asks the customer if they are still there.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: PaymentMethodTimeout

promptsTts.value: Are you still there?
promptsTts.name: Are you still there?

properties.description: Asks the customer for a credit card number.

promptsTts.value: Please enter your card number followed by the pound key when complete.
promptsTts.name: Please enter your card number followed by the pound key when complete.

properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: GetCardNumber

properties.description: Asks the customer if they are still there.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: CardNumberTimeout

promptsTts.value: Are you still there?
promptsTts.name: Are you still there?

properties.description: Tells the customer that the information was invalid.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: CardNumberValidationError

promptsTts.value: Your card number was invalid. Please ensure that your entry is between 13 and 19 digits and try again.
promptsTts.name: Your card number was invalid. Please ensure that your entry is between 13 and 19 digits and try again.

properties.description: Asks the customer for an expiration date.

promptsTts.value: Please enter your card's expiration date in the format month-month-year-year, followed by the pound key when complete.
promptsTts.name: Please enter your card's expiration date in the format month-month-year-year, followed by the pound key when complete.

properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: GetExpirationDate

properties.description: Asks the customer if they are still there.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: ExpirationDateTimeout

promptsTts.value: Are you still there?
promptsTts.name: Are you still there?

properties.description: Tells the customer that the information was invalid.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: ExpirationDateValidationError

promptsTts.value: The expiration date was invalid. Please ensure that your entry is between 3 and 4 digits and try again.
promptsTts.name: The expiration date was invalid. Please ensure that your entry is between 3 and 4 digits and try again.

properties.description: Tokenizes the card info with Zift.
properties.contentType:name: JSON
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: TokenizeCard
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Checks if the tokenize request was successful.
properties.name: CheckTokenizeCardResponse
properties.expression:name: INTEGER

properties.name: SetCardNumber
properties.description: Sets the card number.

properties.name: SetExpirationDate
properties.description: Sets the expiration date.

properties.name: SetCardMethod
properties.description: Sets the payment method to credit card.
Submits the payment token to C3 for processing.
properties.contentType:name: JSON
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: SubmitCardPayment
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Checks that the submit payment request was successful.
properties.name: CheckSubmitResponse
properties.expression:name: INTEGER

properties.name: MissingToken
properties.description: Checks if a token was missing in the response.

properties.name: SetBankMethod
properties.description: Sets the payment method to bank account.
Asks the customer for a bank account number.

promptsTts.value: Please enter your bank account number followed by the pound key when complete.
promptsTts.name: Please enter your bank account number followed by the pound key when complete.

properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: GetAccountNumber
SetAccountNumber
properties.description: Sets the bank account number.
Asks the customer if they are still there.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: AccountNumberTimeout

promptsTts.value: Are you still there?
promptsTts.name: Are you still there?

properties.description: Tells the customer that the information was invalid.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: AccountNumberValidationError

promptsTts.value: Your account number was invalid. Please ensure that your entry is between 4 and 17 digits and try again.
promptsTts.name: Your account number was invalid. Please ensure that your entry is between 4 and 17 digits and try again.

properties.description: Asks the customer for a bank routing number.

promptsTts.value: Please enter your bank's routing number, followed by the pound key when complete.
promptsTts.name: Please enter your bank's routing number, followed by the pound key when complete.

properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: GetRoutingNumber

properties.description: Tells the customer that the information was invalid.

promptsTts.value: The routing number was invalid. Please ensure that your entry is 9 digits and try again.
promptsTts.name: The routing number was invalid. Please ensure that your entry is 9 digits and try again.

properties.description: Asks the customer if they are still there.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: RoutingNumberTimeout

promptsTts.value: Are you still there?
promptsTts.name: Are you still there?

properties.description: Sets the routing number.

Submits the payment token to C3 for processing.

properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: SubmitBankPayment
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Checks that the submit payment request was successful.

properties.expression:name: INTEGER

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the customer has selected the credit card payment method.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportCreditCardSelected
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the customer has selected the bank account payment method.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportBankAccountSelected
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the customer has entered the credit card number.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportCardNumberEntered
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the customer has entered the bank account number.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportAccountNumberEntered
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the customer has entered the card expiration date.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportExpirationDateEntered
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the customer has entered the bank account routing number.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportRoutingNumberEntered
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Tokenizes the bank info with Zift.
properties.contentType:name: JSON
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: TokenizeBank
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the payment info was successfully tokenized.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportCardTokenized
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the payment info was successfully tokenized.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportBankTokenized
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the payment successfully submitted to C3.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportPaymentProcessed
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Tells the customer that the payment was successful.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: PaymentSuccess

promptsTts.value: Your payment was processed successfully.
promptsTts.name: Your payment was processed successfully.

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the payment failed to submit to C3.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportPaymentSubmissionError
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Tells the customer that the payment failed.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: PaymentSubmissionError

promptsTts.value: The payment failed to submit because of an unknown error.
promptsTts.name: The payment failed to submit because of an unknown error.

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the payment info couldn't be tokenized (usually because of incorrect information).
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportPaymentValidationError
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Tells the customer the error in validating the payment info.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: PaymentValidationError

promptsTts.value: There was a problem validating your {{ PaymentMethod }} information: {{ PaymentError }}
promptsTts.name: There was a problem validating your {{ PaymentMethod }} information: {{ PaymentError }}

properties.destinationLookupType:name: ID
properties.description: Queues the customer back to the agent they were talking with.
properties.recoveryQueue:name: Queue-1
properties.name: QueueToAgent
properties.reportingQueue:name: Queue-1
properties.priority:name: P1 (Priority 1)

properties.name: EndFlow
properties.description: Ends the flow.
Tells the customer that there was an error returning to the agent.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: AgentTransferError

promptsTts.value: An error occurred and we couldn't return you back to the agent.
promptsTts.name: An error occurred and we couldn't return you back to the agent.

properties.description: Tells the customer that they are being returned to the agent.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: ReturningToAgent

promptsTts.value: Returning you to the agent.
promptsTts.name: Returning you to the agent.

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the customer is being transferred back to them. This forces them to become available.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportCustomerTransferring
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.name: CheckForEmail
properties.description: Checks if an email address was provided for the customer.
Sends an email receipt to the customer through C3.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: SendReceipt
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Checks if the receipt request was successful.
properties.name: CheckReceiptResponse
properties.expression:name: INTEGER

properties.description: Tells the customer that the receipt was sent successfully.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: ReceiptSuccess

promptsTts.value: A receipt has been sent to your email address, {{ C3ContactEmail }}.
promptsTts.name: A receipt has been sent to your email address, {{ C3ContactEmail }}.

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the receipt email failed to send.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportReceiptError
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Tells the customer that there was a problem sending the receipt.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: ReceiptError

promptsTts.value: There was an error sending the receipt to your email address, {{ C3ContactEmail }}. Please contact customer support to receive a receipt for this transaction.
promptsTts.name: There was an error sending the receipt to your email address, {{ C3ContactEmail }}. Please contact customer support to receive a receipt for this transaction.

properties.description: Sets variables based on the defined C3 environment.
properties.name: SetEnvironment
properties.expression:name: STRING

properties.description: Speaks an error to the customer about the environment configuration.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: UnknownEnvironment

promptsTts.value: The provided environment "{{ C3Env }}" does not match any known environments. Please check that this has been configured correctly and try again.
promptsTts.name: The provided environment "{{ C3Env }}" does not match any known environments. Please check that this has been configured correctly and try again.

properties.name: SetC3DevUrl
properties.description: Sets the C3 base URL to the development URL.

properties.name: SetC3StagingUrl
properties.description: Sets the C3 base URL to the staging URL.

properties.name: SetC3ProdUrl
properties.description: Sets the C3 base URL to the production URL.

properties.name: SetZiftProdSubdomain
properties.description: Sets the Zift domain to production.

properties.name: SetZiftDevStagingSubdomain
properties.description: Sets the Zift domain to sandbox.
Speaks an error to the customer about setting up the environment.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: EnvironmentSetupError

promptsTts.value: There was an error setting up the environment.
promptsTts.name: There was an error setting up the environment.

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the customer has entered the payment IVR.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportIvrStarted
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Speaks the amount requested to the customer.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: SpeakAmount

promptsTts.value: Hi, {{ C3ContactFirstName }}. A payment has been requested for the amount of ${{ C3PaymentAmount }}.
promptsTts.name: Hi, {{ C3ContactFirstName }}. A payment has been requested for the amount of ${{ C3PaymentAmount }}.

properties.name: CheckEmptyPaymentAmount
properties.description: Checks for an empty payment amount.

properties.name: CheckEmptyPaymentRequestId
properties.description: Checks for an empty payment request ID.
Speaks the missing field to the contact.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: MissingPaymentRequestId

promptsTts.value: A value was not provided for "Payment Request ID". Please inform the agent of this and try again.
promptsTts.name: A value was not provided for "Payment Request ID". Please inform the agent of this and try again.

properties.description: Speaks the missing field to the contact.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: MissingPaymentAmount

promptsTts.value: A value was not provided for "Payment Amount". Please inform the agent of this and try again.
promptsTts.name: A value was not provided for "Payment Amount". Please inform the agent of this and try again.

properties.name: CheckEmptyContactName
properties.description: Checks for an empty contact name.
Speaks the missing field to the contact.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: MissingContactName

promptsTts.value: A value was not provided for "Contact First Name". Please inform the agent of this and try again.
promptsTts.name: A value was not provided for "Contact First Name". Please inform the agent of this and try again.

properties.description: Speaks the missing field to the contact.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: MissingCciAgentId

promptsTts.value: A value was not provided for "CCI Agent ID". An error prevents us from returning you to the agent. Please try again later.
promptsTts.name: A value was not provided for "CCI Agent ID". An error prevents us from returning you to the agent. Please try again later.

properties.name: AbandonEarly
properties.description: End the flow if we are unable to return the contact to the agent.

properties.name: CheckEmptyCciAgentId
properties.description: Checks for an empty CCI agent ID.

promptsTts.value: Press 1 or 2.
promptsTts.name: Press 1 or 2.

promptsTts.value: Unknown
promptsTts.name: Unknown

properties.expression:name: STRING
properties.description: Sets variables based on the defined C3 environment.
Speaks an error to the customer about the environment configuration.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: UnknownEnvironment

promptsTts.value: The provided environment "{{ C3Env }}" does not match any known environments. Please check that this has been configured correctly and try again.
promptsTts.name: The provided environment "{{ C3Env }}" does not match any known environments. Please check that this has been configured correctly and try again.

properties.name: SetC3DevUrl
properties.description: Sets the C3 base URL to the development URL.

properties.name: SetC3StagingUrl
properties.description: Sets the C3 base URL to the staging URL.

properties.name: SetC3ProdUrl
properties.description: Sets the C3 base URL to the production URL.

properties.name: SetZiftProdSubdomain
properties.description: Sets the Zift domain to production.

properties.name: SetZiftDevStagingSubdomain
properties.description: Sets the Zift domain to sandbox.
Speaks an error to the customer about setting up the environment.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: EnvironmentSetupError

promptsTts.value: There was an error setting up the environment.
promptsTts.name: There was an error setting up the environment.

properties.description: Reports to the agent that the customer has entered the payment IVR.
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportIvrStarted
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.description: Speaks the amount requested to the customer.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: SpeakAmount

promptsTts.value: Hi, {{ C3ContactFirstName }}. A payment has been requested for the amount of ${{ C3PaymentAmount }}.
promptsTts.name: Hi, {{ C3ContactFirstName }}. A payment has been requested for the amount of ${{ C3PaymentAmount }}.

properties.name: CheckEmptyPaymentAmount
properties.description: Checks for an empty payment amount.

properties.name: CheckEmptyPaymentRequestId
properties.description: Checks for an empty payment request ID.
Speaks the missing field to the contact.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: MissingPaymentRequestId

promptsTts.value: A value was not provided for "Payment Request ID". Please inform the agent of this and try again.
promptsTts.name: A value was not provided for "Payment Request ID". Please inform the agent of this and try again.

properties.description: Speaks the missing field to the contact.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: MissingPaymentAmount

promptsTts.value: A value was not provided for "Payment Amount". Please inform the agent of this and try again.
promptsTts.name: A value was not provided for "Payment Amount". Please inform the agent of this and try again.

properties.name: CheckEmptyContactName
properties.description: Checks for an empty contact name.
Speaks the missing field to the contact.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: MissingContactName

promptsTts.value: A value was not provided for "Contact First Name". Please inform the agent of this and try again.
promptsTts.name: A value was not provided for "Contact First Name". Please inform the agent of this and try again.

properties.description: Speaks the missing field to the contact.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: MissingCciAgentId

promptsTts.value: A value was not provided for "CCI Agent ID". An error prevents us from returning you to the agent. Please try again later.
promptsTts.name: A value was not provided for "CCI Agent ID". An error prevents us from returning you to the agent. Please try again later.

properties.name: AbandonEarly
properties.description: End the flow if we are unable to return the contact to the agent.

properties.name: CheckEmptyCciAgentId
properties.description: Checks for an empty CCI agent ID.

promptsTts.value: Press 1 or 2.
promptsTts.name: Press 1 or 2.

promptsTts.value: Unknown
promptsTts.name: Unknown

properties.description: Tells the contact that an unexpected error occurred.
properties.connector:name: Cisco Cloud Text-to-Speech
properties.name: SpeakError

promptsTts.value: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
promptsTts.name: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

properties.name: EndErrorFlow
properties.description: Ends the flow.
Reports that the contact has ended the call.
properties.contentType:name: JSON
properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
properties.name: ReportContactDisconnected
properties.httpRequestMethod:name: POST

properties.name: EndContactFlow
properties.description: Ends the flow.
Tells the contact that an unexpected error occurred.

properties.name: SpeakError

promptsTts.value: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
promptsTts.name: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

properties.name: EndErrorFlow
properties.description: Ends the flow.
Reports that the contact has ended the call.

properties.httpContentType:name: Application/JSON
